title: How to Make Kirby Breakdance in Kirby Air Ride (Gamecube)

steps.headline: Play 2 player with someone.
steps.description: If you can't have a Level 1 CPU.

steps.headline: Set it in the underground area.
Stand on the edge of a slanted wall that leads to the Underground, and jump.
steps.description: He should appear to be sliding on his side.

steps.headline: Be careful, slide so you get hit by the bomb.
Kirby should be spinning on his foot.
If you still have trouble making Kirby breakdance, see the external links.

text: Go to City Trial.  Play 2 player with someone. If you can't have a Level 1 CPU. Find a Time Bomb.  Set it in the underground area.  Get off of your machine.  Stand on the edge of a slanted wall that leads to the Underground, and jump. He should appear to be sliding on his side. Be careful, slide so you get hit by the bomb.  Kirby should be spinning on his foot. Breakdancing Kirby, at your service! If you still have trouble making Kirby breakdance, see the external links.
